title: Bye!
description: Say good bye to your loved  ones, and welcome grief with this terrible cake!

title: Crying out
description: There is no hope in this life, so give this poorly made cake to yourself!

title: Broken
description: Relationships only bring suffering, eat this cake to numb the feeling a bit!

title: The end
description: You can wipe your tears with this cake remembering you're not wanted!
